pip:Resource.pip:name: LnList
pip:Resource.pip:description: Creates softlinks in the working-dir for each subfolder of a XNAT session id. The list of session ids is selected from a Parameter file by specifying which column represents the session ids.

pip:argument.pip:name: parameter-name
pip:argument.pip:description: The parameter name which corresponds to session ids in the Parameters document

pip:argument.pip:name: working-dir
pip:argument.pip:description: The directory into the softlinks are to be created

pip:argument.pip:name: from-subdir
pip:argument.pip:description: The subdirectory of each session which is to be linked
